channel.title: Slow ass fucking torrent speed downloads?
channel.description:
Kay. So I was downloading a torrent. It's about 5.9GB. Right now I have 5.6. About up to 4.9 Gb It started downloading really fucking slow. As before I was downloading at like 200 + kb\s. Right now I'm downloading at like 5 - 20 kb\s. It says theres 1500 + Seeds, But I have 8 connected. All of the others are idle. Here's a picture. [IMG]http://i183.photobucket.com/albums/x34/luke_livez/wdf.jpg[/img] No, Don't recommend uTorrent. It downloads even slower. This happens to me with EVERY torrent, As soon as I get over 85 % + In the download, It starts to slow the fuck down. Anyone have any tips on speeding up my download without having to redownload it with another program?
EDIT: Something strange is going on. When I have NOTHING connecting to the internet (Browsers, Msn ect.) It's at 9kb\s or lower. But when I'm on Msn, My browser, Watching HD videos on youtube. It goes over 40 + Kb\s. What the fuck? Isn't it supposed to be the other way around? Anyway. Thanks in advance.

item.title: Slow ass fucking torrent speed downloads?

[quote=“sanga282, post:18, topic:288239”]stop using a shit tracker its not the client effecting the torrent speed its the seeds. What homo tracker are you even using?[/quote]His homo one, he has the the whole homo collection

item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Port forward the port the program for torrents you use. That should help you out, plus just because you have a lot of seeders you could also have a large number of leechers. So… keep an eye on both numbers and just wait.

item.title: Slow ass fucking torrent speed downloads?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Sometimes ISPs limit Internet Speed if you are downloading excessive amounts of data via p2p sites.

Just wait. I have used torrents that download < 1kb/s

`Lewk_:

It says theres 1500 + Seeds

Quantity isnt important. Most are obviously capping uploads to like 0.1kb/s

Read full topic
